Sovollar: 1.  Do you like shopping?
Jovoblar (EN):
Yes, I like shopping.
I like buying new clothes.
Shopping is fun.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Ha, men xarid qilishni yoqtiraman.
Men yangi kiyimlar sotib olishni yaxshi ko‘raman.
Xarid qilish qiziqarli.

Sovollar: 2.  Do you go shopping on Sundays?
Jovoblar (EN):
Yes, I go shopping on Sundays.
I go with my family.
We buy food and clothes.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Ha, men yakshanba kunlari xarid qilaman.
Men oilam bilan boraman.
Biz ovqat va kiyim olamiz.

Sovollar: 3.  Do you buy your clothes online?
Jovoblar (EN):
Sometimes I buy clothes online.
It is easy and fast.
I like online shopping.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Ba’zan men kiyimlarni internetdan olaman.
Bu oson va tez.
Menga onlayn xarid yoqadi.

Sovollar: 4.  Are clothes cheap in your country?
Jovoblar (EN):
Clothes are not very cheap in my country.
Some clothes are expensive.
I buy clothes on sale.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Mening mamlakatimda kiyimlar juda arzon emas.
Ba’zi kiyimlar qimmat.
Men chegirmada kiyim sotib olaman.

Sovollar: 1.  How do you spend your free time?
Jovoblar (EN): I read books and cook food for my family.
Jovoblar (UZ): Men kitob o‘qiyman va oilam uchun ovqat pishiraman.

Sovollar: 2.  How often do you go shopping?
Jovoblar (EN):
I go shopping once a week.
I buy food and clothes.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Men haftasiga bir marta xarid qilaman. 
Oziq-ovqat va kiyim sotib olaman.

Sovollar: 3.  Speak about a shopping centre you like.
Jovoblar (EN):
I like “City Mall”. 
It is modern and comfortable.
I go there with my family.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Men “City Mall”ni yoqtiraman. 
U zamonaviy va qulay. 
Men oilam bilan boraman.

Sovollar: 4.  Speak about your day.
Jovoblar (EN):
I wake up at 7 o’clock.
I go to work at 9 o’clock and come home at 8 p.m.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Men soat 7 da turaman. 
Men 9 da ishga boraman va 8 da uyga qaytaman.

Sovollar: 1.  What is your hobby?
Jovoblar (EN): My hobbies are playing football and reading books.
Jovoblar (UZ): Mening hobbilarim futbol o‘ynash va kitob o‘qish.

Sovollar: 2.  Do you like cooking at home?
Jovoblar (EN):
Yes, I like cooking.
I enjoy making plov.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Ha, men ovqat pishirishni yoqtiraman.
Plov qilishni yaxshi ko‘raman.

Sovollar: 3.  Do you do morning exercises?
Jovoblar (EN): Yes, I do morning exercises every day.
Jovoblar (UZ): Ha, men har kuni ertalab mashq qilaman.

Sovollar: 4.  Do you like watching films?
Jovoblar (EN):
Yes, I like watching films.
My favourite film is Prison Break.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Ha, men film tomosha qilishni yoqtiraman.
Mening sevimli filmim Prison Break.

Sovollar: 1.  Speak about your last holiday.
Jovoblar (EN):
I went on holiday in July 2025.
I rested in the mountains.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Men 2025-yil iyul oyida ta’tilga chiqdim.
Tog‘da dam oldim.

Sovollar: 2.  Speak about your last birthday party.
Jovoblar (EN):
I celebrated my birthday at home.
My family was with me.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Men tug‘ilgan kunimni uyda nishonladim.
Oilam yonimda edi.

Sovollar: 3.  Speak about your house.
Jovoblar (EN):
My house is small but comfortable.
I live with my family.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Mening uyim kichik, lekin qulay. 
Men oilam bilan yashayman.

Sovollar: 4.  Talk about a book you like.
Jovoblar (EN):
I like reading books.
My favourite book is Rich Dad Poor Dad.
I read it three times.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Men kitob o‘qishni yoqtiraman.
Sevimli kitobim Rich Dad Poor Dad.
Men uni uch marta o‘qiganman.

Sovollar: 1.  Do you often get up early?
Jovoblar (EN):
Yes, I do.
I get up at 7 every day.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Ha, turaman. 
Men har kuni soat 7 da turaman.

Sovollar: 2.  Do you always have breakfast with your family?
Sovollar (UZ): Siz doimo oilangiz bilan nonushta qilasizmi?
Jovoblar (EN): Yes, I do. I always have breakfast with my family.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Ha, qilaman.
Men doimo oilam bilan nonushta qilaman.

Sovollar: 3.  What time do you go to school / university / work?
Sovollar (UZ): Siz maktabga / universitetga / ishga soat nechada borasiz?
Jovoblar (EN): I go to work at 8.
Jovoblar (UZ): Men ishga soat 8 da boraman.

Sovollar: 4.  What time do you have dinner?
Sovollar (UZ): Siz kechki ovqatni soat nechada yeysiz?
Jovoblar (EN): I do not have dinner.
Jovoblar (UZ): Men kechki ovqat yemayman.

Sovollar: 1.  What do you do on Saturdays and Sundays?
Sovollar (UZ): Shanba va yakshanba kunlari nima qilasiz?
Jovoblar (EN): I read books and cook food for my family.
Jovoblar (UZ): Men kitob o‘qiyman va oilam uchun ovqat pishiraman.

Sovollar: 2.  Speak about the day of the week you do not like.
Sovollar (UZ): Siz yoqtirmaydigan hafta kuni haqida gapiring.
Jovoblar (EN): I do not like Monday. I do not know why, but it is a hard day.
Jovoblar (UZ): Menga dushanba kuni yoqmaydi. Nima uchunligini bilmayman, lekin u og‘ir o‘tadi.

Sovollar: 3.  Which days of the week do you have your English lessons?
Sovollar (UZ): Siz ingliz tili darslarini haftaning qaysi kunlari o‘tasiz?
Jovoblar (EN): I have English lessons on Tuesday, Thursday, and Saturday at 6:30 p.m.
Jovoblar (UZ): Men ingliz tili darslarini seshanba, payshanba va shanba kunlari soat 6:30 da o‘qiyman.

Sovollar: 4.  How often do you meet your friends? What do you do with them?
Sovollar (UZ): Do‘stlaringiz bilan qanchalik tez-tez uchrashasiz? Ular bilan nima qilasiz?
Jovoblar (EN):
I meet my friends once a month. 
We remember our childhood.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Men do‘stlarim bilan oyda bir marta uchrashaman.
Ular bilan yoshlikni eslaymiz.

Sovollar: 1.  Do you live in a house or flat?
Jovoblar (EN): I live in a house.
Jovoblar (UZ): Men uyda yashayman.

Sovollar: 2.  How many rooms are there in your house/flat?
Jovoblar (EN): There are five bedrooms, two living rooms, two bathrooms, one toilet, and one kitchen.
Jovoblar (UZ): Mening uymda 5 ta yotoq xonasi, 2 ta mehmonxona, 2 ta hammom, 1 ta hojatxona va 1 ta oshxona bor.

Sovollar: 3.  Which room do you like?
Jovoblar (EN): I like my own room.
Jovoblar (UZ): Men o‘zimning xonamni yoqtiraman.

Sovollar: 4.  Why do you like this room?
Sovollar (UZ): Nima uchun bu xona sizga yoqadi?
Jovoblar (EN): I like it because it is quiet and comfortable.
Jovoblar (UZ): Men uni yoqtiraman, chunki u tinch va qulay.

Sovollar: 1.  What facilities are there in your house/flat?
Jovoblar (EN):
My house has free internet and an air conditioner. 
We have a beautiful garden.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Mening uyimda tekin internet va konditsioner bor.
Chiroyli bog‘imiz ham bor.

Sovollar: 2.  Can you speak about your living room?
Jovoblar (EN):
My living room is big and comfortable. 
There is a sofa, a table, and a TV.
Jovoblar (UZ): Mening mehmonxonam katta va qulay. Unda divan, stol va televizor bor.

Sovollar: 3.  Would you like to move house? Why?
Jovoblar (EN):
No, I do not want to move.
I like my house.
Jovoblar (UZ):
Yo‘q, men uyni almashtirmoqchi emasman.
Menga uyim yoqadi.

Sovollar: 4.  What are expensive possessions in the house for you? Why?
Sovollar (UZ): Uyingizdagi siz uchun qimmat buyumlar nima? Nima uchun?
Jovoblar (EN): My TV and computer are expensive for me because I use them every day.
Jovoblar (UZ): Mening televizor va kompyuterim qimmat, chunki men ularni har kuni ishlataman.

Sovollar: 1.  Do you like going to cafés?
Jovoblar (EN): Yes, I like going to cafés. I go with my friends.
Jovoblar (UZ): Ha, men kafelarga borishni yoqtiraman. Do‘stlarim bilan boraman.

Sovollar: 2.  What cafés are popular in your town?
Jovoblar (EN): Basri Baba and Zoxid Kabob are popular cafés in my town.
Jovoblar (UZ): Mening shahrimda Basri Baba va Zoxid Kabob mashhur.

Sovollar: 3.  What café food and drinks do you like?
Sovollar (UZ): Siz kafeda qaysi ovqat va ichimliklarni yoqtirasiz?
Jovoblar (EN): I like Zoxid Kabob. It is very tasty.
Jovoblar (UZ): Men Zoxid kabobni yoqtiraman. U juda mazali.

Sovollar: 4.  Are cafes expensive in your country/city?
Jovoblar (EN): No, cafés are not very expensive. The prices are average.
Jovoblar (UZ): Yo‘q, kafelar juda qimmat emas. Narxlari o‘rtacha.

Sovollar: 1.  What are your plans for the future?
Jovoblar (EN): My plans for the future are to learn English and travel around the world.
Jovoblar (UZ): Kelajakdagi rejalarim ingliz tilini o‘rganish va dunyoni kezish.

Sovollar: 2.  What are you going to do after the exam?
Jovoblar (EN): After the exam, I am going to go to KFC and eat food.
Jovoblar (UZ): Imtihondan keyin KFCga borib ovqatlanmoqchiman.

Sovollar: 3.  Are you going to study in Uzbekistan or in another country?
Sovollar (UZ): Siz O‘zbekistonda yoki boshqa davlatda o‘qimoqchimisiz?
Jovoblar (EN): I am going to study for a master’s degree in the USA.
Jovoblar (UZ): Men magistraturani AQShda o‘qimoqchiman.

Sovollar: 4.  What are you going to do this weekend?
Jovoblar (EN): This weekend, I am going to cook plov for my family.
Jovoblar (UZ): Bu hafta oxirida oilam uchun palov pishirib bermoqchiman.

Sovollar: 1.  Do you have good neighbours? Who are they?
Sovollar (UZ): Sizning yaxshi qo‘shnilaringiz bormi? Ular kimlar?
Jovoblar (EN): Yes, I have good neighbours. They are kind and friendly people.
Jovoblar (UZ): Ha, mening yaxshi qo‘shnilarim bor. Ular mehribon va inoq insonlar.

Sovollar: 2.  What are their jobs?
Jovoblar (EN): They are a doctor, a banker, a taxi driver, and a businessman.
Jovoblar (UZ): Ular shifokor, bank xodimi, taksichi va biznesmen.

Sovollar: 3.  Do you often talk to your neighbours?
Jovoblar (EN): Yes, I talk to them every day. I see them often.
Jovoblar (UZ): Ha, men ular bilan har kuni gaplashaman. Tez-tez ko‘raman.

Sovollar: 4.  Do you help your neighbours?
Jovoblar (EN): Yes, I help my neighbours. I help them when I can.
Jovoblar (UZ): Ha, men qo‘shnilarimga yordam beraman. Qo‘limdan kelgancha yordam qilaman.

Sovollar: 1.  Speak about your next door neighbour.
Jovoblar (EN): My next door neighbour is a doctor. He is a very kind person.
Jovoblar (UZ): Mening yonimdagi qo‘shnim shifokor. U juda yaxshi inson.

Sovollar: 2.  When do you usually meet your neighbour?
Jovoblar (EN): I usually meet my neighbour in the morning and in the evening.
Jovoblar (UZ): Men qo‘shnimni odatda ertalab va kechqurun uchrataman.

Sovollar: 3.  Has your neighbor got a pet?
Jovoblar (EN): Yes, my neighbour has chickens.
Jovoblar (UZ): Ha, qo‘shnimning tovuqlari bor.

Sovollar: 4.  Do you like your neighbour? Why?
Jovoblar (EN): Yes, I like my neighbour because he is kind.
Jovoblar (UZ): Ha, men qo‘shnimni yoqtiraman, chunki u yaxshi inson.

Sovollar: 1.  How many people are there in your family?
Jovoblar (EN): There are nine people in my family. We live together.
Jovoblar (UZ): Mening oilamda to‘qqiz kishi bor. Biz birga yashaymiz.

Sovollar: 2.  Do you have any brothers or sisters? What are their names?
Sovollar (UZ): Sizning aka-uka yoki opa-singillaringiz bormi? Ularning ismlari qanday?
Jovoblar (EN): Yes, I have a brother and a younger brother. Their names are Doniyor and Ismoil.
Jovoblar (UZ): Ha, mening akam va ukam bor. Ularning ismlari Doniyor va Ismoil.

Sovollar: 3.  What are your parents’ jobs?
Jovoblar (EN): My mother is a housewife. My father passed away.
Jovoblar (UZ): Onam uy bekasi. Otam olamdan o‘tganlar.

Sovollar: 4.  What do you like doing with your family?
Sovollar (UZ): Siz oilangiz bilan nima qilishni yoqtirasiz?
Jovoblar (EN): I like travelling with my family.
Jovoblar (UZ): Men oilam bilan sayohat qilishni yoqtiraman.

Sovollar: 1.  What is your favourite day of the week?
Sovollar (UZ): Haftaning qaysi kunini eng yaxshi ko‘rasiz?
Jovoblar (EN): My favourite day is Sunday because I can rest.
Jovoblar (UZ): Eng sevimli kunim yakshanba, chunki dam olaman.

Sovollar: 2.  What do you do with your family on Sundays?
Sovollar (UZ): Yakshanba kunlari oilangiz bilan nima qilasiz?
Jovoblar (EN): We go shopping and cook dinner together.
Jovoblar (UZ): Biz birga xarid qilamiz va kechki ovqatni tayyorlaymiz.

Sovollar: 3.  Where did you go with your family last time?
Sovollar (UZ): Oxirgi safar oilangiz bilan qayerga bordingiz?
Jovoblar (EN): We went to City Mall to buy clothes.
Jovoblar (UZ): Oxirgi safar kiyim olish uchun City Mallga bordik.

Sovollar: 4.  How did you spend your time with your family?
Jovoblar (EN): We watched a film and talked together.
Jovoblar (UZ): Biz film ko‘rdik va birga suhbatlashdik.

Sovollar: 1.  Do you have friends?
Jovoblar (EN): Yes, I have many friends.
Jovoblar (UZ): Ha, mening juda ko‘p do‘stlarim bor.

Sovollar: 2.  Do you often meet with friends?
Jovoblar (EN): We meet once a week.
Jovoblar (UZ): Biz haftasiga bir marta uchrashamiz.

Sovollar: 3.  Who is your best friend?
Jovoblar (EN): My best friend is Anvar. I have known him since childhood.
Jovoblar (UZ): Eng yaqin do‘stim Anvar. Men uni bolaligimizdan taniyman.

Sovollar: 4.  What does your friend like?
Jovoblar (EN): He likes travelling.
Jovoblar (UZ): U sayohat qilishni yoqtiradi.

Sovollar: 1.  Do you like meeting with your friends?
Jovoblar (EN): Yes, I like meeting my friends.
Jovoblar (UZ): Ha, men do‘stlarim bilan uchrashishni yoqtiraman.

Sovollar: 2.  When did you meet with them last time? And where?
Sovollar (UZ): Ularni oxirgi safar qachon uchratdingiz? Qayerda?
Jovoblar (EN): We met last Sunday in a café.
Jovoblar (UZ): Biz oxirgi safar o‘tgan yakshanba kuni kafeda uchrashdik.

Sovollar: 3.  What did you do together?
Jovoblar (EN): We ate food and talked together.
Jovoblar (UZ): Biz ovqatlandik va birga suhbatlashdik.

Sovollar: 4.  Did you like it?
Jovoblar (EN): Yes, I liked it.
Jovoblar (UZ): Ha, menga yoqdi.

Sovollar: 1.  Have you got a job or are you a student?
Jovoblar (EN): I work at the Republican Cadastre.
Jovoblar (UZ): Men Respublika kadastrda ishlayman.

Sovollar: 2.  Which job is your dream job?
Jovoblar (EN): My dream job is to be a businessman.
Jovoblar (UZ): Orzuimdagi kasb biznesmen bo‘lish.

Sovollar: 3.  Do you work in an office?
Jovoblar (EN): Yes, I work in an office.
Jovoblar (UZ): Ha, men ofisda ishlayman.

Sovollar: 4.  Is your job in hospital?
Jovoblar (EN): No, I don’t work in a hospital.
Jovoblar (UZ): Yo‘q, men shifoxonada ishlamayman.

Sovollar: 1.  How do you usually go to work or school?
Sovollar (UZ): Siz odatda ishga yoki maktabga qanday borasiz?
Jovoblar (EN): I have a car. I go to work by car.
Jovoblar (UZ): Menda mashinam bor. Ishga mashinada boraman.

Sovollar: 2.  What is your favorite type of transport?
Jovoblar (EN): My favorite transport is the metro because it is very fast.
Jovoblar (UZ): Sevimli transportim metro, chunki u juda tez yuradi.

Sovollar: 3.  Talk about a trip you had.
Jovoblar (EN): I travelled to Samarkand. It is famous for old buildings.
Jovoblar (UZ): Men Samarqandga sayohat qilganman. U eski binolari bilan mashhur.

Sovollar: 4.  How often do people use public transport?
Sovollar (UZ): Odamlar jamoat transportidan qanchalik tez foydalanadi?
Jovoblar (EN): People often use public transport every day.
Jovoblar (UZ): Odamlar har kuni jamoat transportidan tez-tez foydalanadi.

Sovollar: 1.  Is it sunny today?
Jovoblar (EN): Yes, it is sunny today. or No, it is cloudy today.
Jovoblar (UZ): Ha, bugun quyoshli kun. or Yo‘q, bugun bulutli kun.

Sovollar: 2.  Do you like rainy weather?
Jovoblar (EN): Yes, I like rainy weather very much.
Jovoblar (UZ): Ha, men yomg‘irli ob-havoni juda yoqtiraman.

Sovollar: 3.  Is it hot in the summer?
Jovoblar (EN): Yes, it is very hot in the summer.
Jovoblar (UZ): Ha, yozda juda issiq bo‘ladi.

Sovollar: 4.  What is the weather like in winter?
Jovoblar (EN): The weather is not very good. It rarely snows.
Jovoblar (UZ): Qishda havo unchalik yaxshi emas. Qor juda kam yog‘adi.

Sovollar: 1.  Do you eat at fast food restaurants?
Sovollar (UZ): Siz tez ovqat restoranlarida ovqat yeyasizmi?
Jovoblar (EN): Yes, I eat at KFC.
Jovoblar (UZ): Ha, men KFCda ovqatlanaman.

Sovollar: 2.  What do you order at a restaurant?
Jovoblar (EN): I usually order a cheeseburger.
Jovoblar (UZ): Men odatda cheeseburger buyurtma qilaman.

Sovollar: 3.  Describe a visit to a cafe. What did you eat?
Sovollar (UZ): Kafega qilgan tashrifingizni tasvirlab bering. Nima yedingiz?
Jovoblar (EN): I went to a café last weekend. I ate a cheeseburger and drank cola.
Jovoblar (UZ): O‘tgan hafta oxirida kafega bordim. Cheeseburger yedim va kola ichdim.

Sovollar: 4.  What do you like eating at a restaurant?
Jovoblar (EN): I like eating salad and steak at restaurants.
Jovoblar (UZ): Men restoranda salat va steyk yeyishni yoqtiraman.
